name: iHeLL
description:
Cyberhell. The place all the bad bots go to rot. The place you got thrown into without a second chance. Escape seems impossible…Right?

The big boss of Cyberhell has issued a challenge. Defeat him, and gain freedom to roam the Earth once again as bots were meant to.

You’re not powerful enough to take him on…yet. The Cyberhell arena is a good place to start, every win hands out prizes. Sell those prizes on the auction house for more lifeforce. The more lifeforce you have, the easier fighting becomes. Sell some spare lifeforce for more powerful weapons on the auction house.

Once you’re powerful enough, he’ll be waiting…

Win junk in the arena, sell it at the auction house, buy better guns, face the boss and win. Left click to shoot, WASD to move.

Sorry about the lack of sound, time constraints bla bla.
